Common.downloadCvAria: Download resume of Marianella Gomez Luna

Home.title: Welcome to my digital world
Home.paragraph1: Hi! I'm a passionate software developer focused on creating high-impact digital experiences. I have over five years of experience in web development, specializing in frontend, and a strong backend background with JavaScript technologies like Node.js and NestJS. I also work with relational databases such as PostgreSQL and MySQL.
Home.paragraph2: I'm constantly learning and staying up to date with the latest trends in the web ecosystem. I enjoy working on collaborative projects that combine creativity, strategy, and technology to solve real-world challenges.
Home.paragraph3: In addition to my technical background, I actively promote diversity in tech. I've mentored at MET (Women in Technology), supporting women starting their careers in the field. I'm currently part of Pilar Tecno, a program backed by the Government of La Rioja, where I teach Git and React.
Home.paragraph4: As an independent professional, Iâ€™ve worked on projects of various sizes using tools like Next.js, React Native, Astro, and other modern JavaScript technologies.
Home.paragraph5: I'm excited to keep growing, learning, and building innovative solutions.
